column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=It 's spring time so I decided to plant a tree .
#text=I purchased a small orange tree to go in the back yard .
#text=First I dug a hole where I wanted the tree .
#text=Then I shook the roots of the tree to loosen them .
#text=Then I placed the tree in the hole .
#text=I used a shovel to replace the dirt back over the tree roots .
#text=Once satisfied the tree was firmly in the ground i dragged over the hose .
#text=I watered the tree until I was satisfied and then put mulch around the base .
#text=I also attached ropes to secure the young tree so it would n't fall over while it 's roots were still settling in .
#text=I also had a canval funnel installed to make sure water went right into the roots where it was need most .
#text=Once all was said and done i stepped back to admire my handy work .
